title: JDC Printing Technologies offers Gold Sponsorship for Sri Lanka Print Exhibition & Trade Fair 2022
body_lines: The Sri Lanka Print Exhibition and Trade Fair 2022 organised by the Sri Lanka Association of Printers were held recently at the BMICH. JDC Printing Technologies (Pvt) Ltd. was the Gold Sponsor at this prestigious event.

The exhibition comprised of over 150 stalls displaying all types of products and machinery and equipment used for printing. JDC Printing Technologies which commenced business in 1979, are one of the leading suppliers of machinery and materials to the printing and packaging industry in Sri Lanka.

Being the distributor for Konica Minolta digital printing systems, JDC is further strengthened with the ability to offer the latest digital solutions. Konica Minolta is a popular label series of toner-based printers.

Chandula Perera, Managing Director of JDC Group stated “I am extremely pleased to see the company progressing with the introduction of advanced technologies within the ever changing printing industry creating a wider strategy for customers’ sustainable growth.”
